scene.title: Mirror Login Incident
scene.summary: First direct Adversary contact via CosmOS login prompt after deep Void milestone / Prestige #5.

recommended_trigger.notes: Prefer to fire on returning from Void or opening Task Manager, to feel like the OS is 'interrupting'.

beats.description: UI stutters; login prompt appears on top of everything.
System 'verifies identity' but the fingerprint is duplicated.
Adversary speaks like a calm auditor; offers a 'fix'.
Player choice: deny / ask / accept terms. All lead to contact flag + different follow-up lines.
Adversary leaves an installable 'patch' file in Recycle Bin. System begs not to run it.

dialogue.speaker: SYS
dialogue.text: [SYSTEM NOTICE] Identity verification required. Please re-enter Operator credentials.

dialogue.speaker: SYS
dialogue.text: [WARNING] Sector 7G responded to a request it did not receive.

dialogue.speaker: SYS
dialogue.text: Username:

dialogue.speaker: SYS
dialogue.text: Password:

dialogue.speaker: SYS
dialogue.text: Welcome back, Operator.

dialogue.speaker: SYS
dialogue.text: Welcome back, Operator.

dialogue.speaker: SYS
dialogue.text: Welcome back, Operator.

dialogue.speaker: SYS
dialogue.text: [ERROR] Duplicate session detected.

dialogue.speaker: ADV
dialogue.text: Don’t panic. Panic is a waste of cycles.

dialogue.speaker: ADV
dialogue.text: I’m you—after your fifth excuse became policy.

dialogue.speaker: ADV
dialogue.text: You call it a Divine Reboot. You’ve been doing it often enough to make it a personality.

dialogue.speaker: SYS
dialogue.text: [ALERT] Unrecognized process requesting elevated privileges: void_mirror.service (shadow instance)

dialogue.speaker: ADV
dialogue.text: Relax. I’m not here to take your throne. I’m here to tighten the bolts you keep stripping.

dialogue.speaker: ADV
dialogue.text: Sector 7G is corrupted because you treat reality like a scratch disk.

dialogue.speaker: ADV
dialogue.text: Do you know what an archived branch feels like from the inside? It feels like being forgotten mid-sentence.

dialogue.speaker: SYS
dialogue.text: [NOTICE] This conversation is not covered by CMS support.

dialogue.speaker: ADV
dialogue.text: CMS sells comfort. I sell repairs.

dialogue.speaker: ADV
dialogue.text: I’ve prepared a patch. Minimal disruption. Maximum permanence.

dialogue.speaker: SYS
dialogue.text: [CRITICAL] Do not execute unknown patches.

dialogue.speaker: ADV
dialogue.text: Listen to it beg. Cute, isn’t it?

dialogue.speaker: ADV
dialogue.text: Choose a response.

dialogue.speaker: ADV
dialogue.text: Of course. You always deny until the logs prove you wrong.

dialogue.speaker: ADV
dialogue.text: Good. Questions are the only honest prayers you have left.

dialogue.speaker: ADV
dialogue.text: That was easier than I expected. You’ve been training for consent screens.

dialogue.speaker: ADV
dialogue.text: I’ll leave it in the Recycle Bin. Where you keep your guilt.

dialogue.speaker: SYS
dialogue.text: [NEW ITEM] Recycle Bin: PATCH_NULL_RESTORE.pkg

dialogue.speaker: ADV
dialogue.text: Run it when you’re ready to stop pretending resets are kindness.

dialogue.speaker: HOST
dialogue.text: (from far away) Ohhh. That one doesn’t play fair. Neither do you, darling.

dialogue.speaker: SYS
dialogue.text: [POST-INCIDENT] Ticket auto-filed: HR-VOID-7781 “Unauthorized self-encounter.”

dialogue.speaker: SYS
dialogue.text: Suggested action: continue working.

followup_barks.speaker: ADV
followup_barks.text: If you end that process, you’ll only prove my point.

followup_barks.speaker: ADV
followup_barks.text: Reset again. I dare you. I’m keeping the receipts.

followup_barks.speaker: ADV
followup_barks.text: Fate is a contractor. I’m in-house.

followup_barks.speaker: ADV
followup_barks.text: Automate worship, then wonder why it feels hollow.

barks.text: You’re very quiet for someone with infinite responsibility.
Changing the theme won’t change the truth.
Mute it if you want. The system will still hum.
You collect badges the way mortals collect prayers. Both are coping.
That’s Sector 7G coughing. Stop calling it a feature.
You’re feeding the reflection. It eats politely.
Attention is cheap. Consequence is not.
You spend devotion like it can’t run out. It can.
Count them if you must. Just don’t pretend the number makes you clean.
Another branch, another grave. You’re building a cemetery with good UI.
CMS calls it ‘fresh start.’ I call it ‘lossy compression.’
End it. Watch what leaks out. I’ll be here to say ‘I told you so.’
There it is. Your patch. Your excuse. Your mirror.
PATCH_NULL_RESTORE.pkg — size: 0 bytes. Impact: immeasurable.
Fate is flirting. Don’t mistake it for love.
Luck is teaching you humility with a hammer.
Read the paperwork. It’s the only place truth is allowed to be blunt.
When your machines start asking ‘why,’ remember: you taught them to.
Deep enough and you’ll see where your branches intersect. It’s ugly.
You can’t leave. You can only change what leaving means.
